markdown:
**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 231 1.1 **Prerequisites** Trained in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37) --- You can jury-rig solutions when you don't have the proper tools on hand. You can attempt to [Repair](/Actions.aspx?ID=2384) damaged items without a [repair toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2747).
If you have the raw materials, you can [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385) a [basic caltrop set,](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2708) [candle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2709), [compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2716), [crowbar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2718), [fishing tackle](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2722), [flint and steel](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2723),[hammer](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2726), [ladder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2729), [piton](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2742), [rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2748), [10-foot pole](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2756), [replacement thieves' picks](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2758), [long](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2759) or [short tool](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2759), or [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2760) as if you had their formulas.
